PAGE1.HEADING: Wilkommen zu <clicksta></clicksta>!
PAGE1.TEXT1: <clicksta></clicksta> allows you to quickly count and provides you with all customization and statistics you will need.

PAGE2.HEADING: The Counter
PAGE2.TEXT1: The heart of this application is the simple to use counter. Just click on every part of your touchscreen to increase the counter.
PAGE2.TEXT2: The current counter is shown in the middle so you always see the amount.
PAGE2.TEXT3: Try out some gestures like swiping or holding the finger on your screen. This will allow you to handle further action.

PAGE3.HEADING: Customization
PAGE3.TEXT1: Want to change the look or behavior? No Problem.
PAGE3.TEXT2: The settings view allows you to choose a theme and enable animations and sound. Make clicker your own.
PAGE3.TEXT3: You can also change the action for each gesture which you can use on the counter view. Every gesture can be combined with every action.

PAGE4.HEADING: Statistics
PAGE4.TEXT1: All the information you will need can be viewed on the statistics page.
PAGE4.TEXT2: Charts with detailed trends of your clicks, information about the click amount per time and various other information.
PAGE4.TEXT3: You can also export these statistics!

PAGE5.HEADING: Los gehts!
PAGE5.TEXT1: Das ist alles was du über <clicksta></clicksta> wissen musst.
PAGE5.TEXT2: Viel Spaß und fang an zu klicken.
